title: Introducing: Wealth
body: [![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/Wealth.jpg "Wealth")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8196-introducing-wealth/attachment/wealth) [**Wealth’s**](http://www.facebook.com/pages/Wealth/205495029491430?sk=wall) debut single will creep up on you. It’s tinny, raw and undisturbed at times; but ultimately descends into an electro odyssey that’s too damn free spirited and playful to ignore. Wealth’s stance on public relations and self-image is equally as audacious; “According to his bio **Wealth** was an All-American quarterback in college who then went on to a career in law enforcement, where while undercover befriended a gang of bank robbing surfers and eventually brought the gang to justice while maintaining a respect for their ideologies.” Not the most believable press release from a record label I’ve ever heard, but as far as adding to an already interesting sound, it’s not half bad. **Wealth’s** debut single, ‘_The Battery_’, is out on [**Housewarming Records**](http://housewarmingrecords.wordpress.com/), download it for free bellow. "The Battery" b/w "When Everyday Is Sunday" by Housewarming Records
